alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 4:54PM CDT until June 19 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL KIMBLE...SOUTHEASTERN MENARD AND WEST CENTRAL MASON COUNTIES... At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Us- 83 Near The Kimble- Menard County Line, or 8 miles west of London, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... London around 520 PM CDT. Saline around 530 PM CDT. Long Mountain around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 377 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line, Erna and Us- 83 Near The Kimble-Menard County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
